resources.string: HOW DO I USE THE APP?

This app predicts your caffeine content for the next few hours depending on what you drink. 

INSTRUCTIONS

 1. Click on the ADD DRINK button on the Home Page

 2. Select the drink you want, and the time you will drink it

 3. Click on ADD MY DRINK

 4. OR if you want to add a new drink that is not on the list, click on ADD CUSTOM DRINK and add your drink to the list

 Powered By: Caffeinated Coders

 Andres Rojas
 Anthony Byrne
 Nehemiah Dures
